title.rendered: Accent Equity acquires a majority stake in the Götessons Group

content.rendered:
Mannheimer Swartling has assisted the investment fund Accent Equity 2017 in acquiring a majority stake in the Götessons group from Connecting Capital.

Götessons, with its headquarter in Ulricehamn, Sweden, was established in 1984 and has since developed into an international group, offering a full assortment of work environment solutions, mainly for the office space, but also for hotels and other environments. The group also provides acoustics consulting expertise under the name Akustikmiljö, in Falkenberg, Sweden. Götessons’ wide product range today includes desk and floor screens, lightning solutions, wall and ceiling absorbents, soft seating and workspace accessories.

Accent Equity has as its aim to, together with the management, who will stay on as co-owners, accelerate the company’s international expansion.
